page.title: 01Kirkcolm Block
page.content: There is not much in this area, Kirkcolm is a small farming village the nearest large town is Stranroer (6 1/2 miles) around the village there is many farms mostly farming purposes. like rough grazing and Dairy pastuers to the EAst of Kirkcolm there is Cor sewall Estate and Loch Ryan to the south is the Scar Bird Reserve and the Wig Bay Holiday Park and the sailing club where you may hire dinghys To the North it is mainly farms and to the West there is a very small village called Ervie and Loch Carnel.
